overview:
Adrienne Harrington is a North Carolina native, who has been a driven entrepreneur her whole life. She comes from the field of marketing, design and construction and has led teams on large and small projects always following detailed scheduling guidelines that has kept all her projects on-time and on-budget.

Adrienne created Dexterity to focus on design and innovation; not only pursuing advances in the Wi-Fi industry, but also looking toward other ideas to simplify everyday life, embrace green technology, and help people save money. The MorphCase has been a full-time endeavor for her since 2012 and she is dedicated to seeing it all the way through production, fulfillment and beyond. _

“With me it it’s about quality and delivering something I am proud to have created. My best identifiable skill is the ability to find great creative people who have skills I don’t possess to work with and build things.”

“For the MorphCase, I gathered a group of brilliant designers, with incredible talent in web and mobile technologies…some sharp individuals possessing in-depth technical and commercial expertise…a team of clever marketing strategists…and an ingenious manufacturing company to help me bring an idea in my head to life.”

— Adrienne Harrington, CEO of Dexterity
